thread.title: Amazon Toys hot list: What's new this month
thread.title_full: Amazon Toys hot list: What's new this month | Newsday

author: newsday.com
title: Amazon Toys hot list: What's new this month
text:
Goal! Hit the ice with this PLAYMOBIL NHL Hockey Arena Playset featuring four NHL players with movable arm and hockey stick; $59.99 at amazon.com . (Credit: PLAYMOBIL)
Each month, the Amazon Toys & Games team votes on their favorite toys of the month.
The selections may be new toys and games that recently hit the market or that are customer favorites and bestsellers.
So if you're looking for new toys for your kids -- or a gift for a child's birthday party or holiday -- check out the Editor's Picks of hot new toys on Amazon.com....
